channel.title: Release Notes - 2022 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2022 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 22.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 22.12. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 22.12 is ready for use with Aspose C++ products ver 22.12. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 22.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 22.11. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 22.11 is is based on the latest Aspose.Page for .NET 22.11 and ready for use with Aspose C++ products ver 22.11. MacOS platform is supported now. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 22.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 22.4. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 22.4 is is based on the latest Aspose.Page for .NET 22.4 and ready for use with Aspose C++ products ver 22.4. Support to set XMP metadata in EPS document was added. Support to merge multiple EPS/XPS documents to PDF was added. The developer guide on using merge. You can consult Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 22.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 22.1. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 22.1 is ready for use with Aspose C++ products ver 22.1. The product dll files are signed with Aspose certificate. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.
